atk-s0517a17:2_1: Idāni pahānāvasānāya abhisamayakathāya anantaraṁ pahānākāraṁ dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya vivekakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a17:2_2: Tattha suttante tāva ye kecīti anavasesapariyādānaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:2_7: Bhāvetīti bhinnasīlassa bhāvanābhāvato idha pana lokiyalokuttarā maggabhāvanā adhippetāti.
atk-s0517a17:2_8: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekaṁ samucchedavivekaṁ nissaraṇavivekaṁ nissitaṁ. Vivekoti vivittatā.
atk-s0517a17:2_9: Ayañhi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṁ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṁ, maggakkhaṇe kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṁ, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṁ bhāveti. Esa nayo virāganissitādīsu.
atk-s0517a17:2_10: Vivekoyeva hi virajjanaṭṭhena virāgo, nirodhaṭṭhena nirodho, vosajjanaṭṭhena vosaggo.
atk-s0517a17:2_11: Atha vā kilesehi vivittattā viveko, kilesehi virattattā virāgo, kilesānaṁ niruddhattā nirodho, kilesānañca pariccattattā vissaṭṭhattā, nibbānecattassa ca vissaṭṭhattā vosaggo.
atk-s0517a17:2_12: Vosaggo pana duvidho pariccāgavosaggo ca pakkhandanavosaggo ca.
atk-s0517a17:2_13: Tattha pariccāgavosaggoti vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena kilesappahānaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:2_14: Pakkhandanavosaggoti vipassanākkhaṇe tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:2_16: Tathā hi ayaṁ sammādiṭṭhiādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbānañca pakkhandati.
atk-s0517a17:2_17: Vosaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vosaggatthaṁ pariṇāmitaṁ pariṇataṁ, paripaccitaṁ paripakkañcāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0517a17:2_18: Ayampi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā sammādiṭṭhiādīsu ekeko dhammo kilesapariccāgavosaggatthañca nibbānapakkhandanavosaggatthañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṁ bhāveti.
atk-s0517a17:3_0: 23.Bījagāmabhūtagāmāti ettha mūlabījaṁ khandhabījaṁ aggabījaṁ phaḷubījaṁ bījabījanti (pāci.
atk-s0517a17:3_1: 91) pañcavidhaṁ bījaṁ, bījagāmo nāma bījasamūhoti attho.
atk-s0517a17:3_2: Tadeva pana sampannanīlaṅkurapātubhāvato paṭṭhāya bhūtagāmo nāma, bhūtānaṁ jātānaṁ nibbattamūlanīlaṅkurānaṁ samūhoti attho.
atk-s0517a17:3_3: Devatāpariggahe sati nīlaṅkurakālato pabhuti hotīti tesaṁ devatāsaṅkhātānaṁ bhūtānaṁ gāmotipi bhūtagāmoti vadanti. Vuddhinti aṅkurādivasena. Viruḷhinti khandhādivasena. Vepullanti pupphādivasena.
atk-s0517a17:3_6: Vepullanti kiccanipphattivasena vipulabhāvanti attho. Vipulattantipi pāṭho.
atk-s0517a17:3_7: Atha vā etāni tīṇi padāni sīlasamādhipaññāhipi yojenti.
atk-s0517a17:5_2: Jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānesu lokiyaviratisampayuttacitte ca yathāyogaṁ sampayogato ca ārammaṇato ca vattamānāya sammādiṭṭhiyā sāmaññalakkhaṇato ekībhūtāya sammādiṭṭhiyā.
atk-s0517a17:5_3: Vikkhambhanavivekoti vikkhambhanavasena dūrīkaraṇavasena viveko. Kesaṁ? Nīvaraṇānaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:5_4: Tassa paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvayatotiādi vikkhambhanavasena paṭhamajjhānameva vuttaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:5_6: Jhānesupi sammādiṭṭhiyā vijjamānattā sammādiṭṭhiyā viveko nāma hoti.
atk-s0517a17:5_8: Diṭṭhigatānanti diṭṭhivivekassa dukkarattā padhānattā ca diṭṭhivivekova vutto.
atk-s0517a17:5_17: Cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitanti pubbabhāgeyeva cittañca assa yogissa suadhiṭṭhitaṁ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitaṁ hoti.
atk-s0517a17:5_18: Iti chando saddhā cittanti ime tayo dhammā pubbabhāge uppannavivekānaṁ upanissayattā nissayā nāma.
atk-s0517a17:5_19: Keci pana ‘‘cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitanti samādhi vutto’’ti vadanti. Virāgādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0517a17:6_0: Nirodhavāre pana nirodhasaddato aññaṁ pariyāyavacanaṁ dassentena amatā dhātūti vuttaṁ, sesesu nirodho nibbānanti ubhayatthāpi nibbānameva.
atk-s0517a17:6_1: Dvādasa nissayāti chandasaddhācittāniyeva vivekādīsu catūsu ekekasmiṁ tayo tayo katvā dvādasa nissayā honti.
atk-s0517a17:7_2: Sammāvācākammantā jīvānaṁ pana jhānakkhaṇe vipassanākkhaṇe ca abhāvā jhānavipassanānaṁ pubbabhāgaparabhāgavasena vattamānā viratiyo jhānavipassanā sannissitā katvā vuttāti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:7_3: Nīvaraṇānaṁ diṭṭhigatānañca vivekavirāganirodhapaṭinissaggā tathā pavattamānānaṁ viratīnaṁ vivekādayo nāmāti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:7_4: Yathā aṭṭhakanipāte ‘‘tato, tvaṁ bhikkhu, imaṁ samādhiṁ savitakkaṁ savicārampi bhāveyyāsi, avitakkavicāramattampi bhāveyyāsi, avitakkaṁ avicārampi bhāveyyāsi, sappītikampi bhāveyyāsi, nippītikampi bhāveyyāsi, sātasahagatampi bhāveyyāsi, upekkhāsahagatampi bhāveyyāsī’’ti (a. ni.
atk-s0517a17:7_5: 8.63) mettādayo kāyānupassanādayo ca niyakajjhattamūlasamādhivasena catukkapañcakajjhānikā viya vuttā, evamidhāpi pubbabhāgaparabhāgavasena viratiyo vuttāti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a17:7_7: Gambhīrañhi buddhavacanaṁ, ācariye payirupāsitvā adhippāyato gahetabbaṁ.
